title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Skills: Social and Financial Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the interaction between social influence and financial decision-making and apply it through case studies
Learners can plan and execute leadership workshops using student-centered instructional design principles
Learners can propose social value creation strategies in a 3-week team project using digital collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
